comments.body: These test names aren't very descriptive, can you add comments to each test explaining what scenario they are trying to test?  For example, my guess is in this one you are validating that an m_mul < 1 is properly computed according to the LR equation.
You are right, we will add comments.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +90,94 @@        self.assertAllClose(org, sgdr)

  def testMDecay(self):
    """Test m_mul argument. Check values for learning rate at the beginning
    of the first, second, third and fourth period. """
